name: $BROKE again
description: In a world where making a living should be simple, Dr. Evil lurks in the shadows, ready to pounce. Whether you’ve just started stacking up some $$ or you’re a crypto whale, he’s going to find a way to drain your gains: a policy here, a tax system there, or a sneaky financial loophole to slash your stash. And just like that, you’re $BROKE again Download a wallet app like Phantom or Solflare and follow the setup steps. It's like getting your pocket picked by tech-savvy squirrels—only these ones help you manage your crypto nuts!
